preference.name: S2cl_EnableTagSuggestions
preference.preference_description: Defines a switch to turn on/off the tag suggestions while creating tags. All the available tag names are cached when the user tries to create a tag for the first time. As the number of tags grows over a period of time, caching the tag names might pose a performance bottleneck. Set this preference to false to turn off caching.
